summary:
- **Completed soil sampling programs** covering ~1.9km² at Tolmer, ~23km² at Black Oak Tank (Tarcoola Gold Project), and ~6km² at 308 prospect (Challenger Gold Project).  
- **Assay results expected**:  
  - Tolmer drilling results – July 2025  
  - Tolmer soil samples – September 2025  
  - Black Oak Tank & 308 prospects – October 2025  
- **Exploration focus**: Testing regional targets near existing infrastructure (Central Gawler Mill and Tarcoola Gold Project).  

*No material trading or capital markets impact identified (operational update only).*
